name: Protector of the Mage Guild
text: If you control no monsters you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Special Summoned you can reveal 1 Spellcaster monster in your hand; Shuffle it into the Deck and add 1 "Mage Guild" monster with a different Attribute from your Deck to your hand. If you would Link Summon a Link-1 "Mage Guild" monster, you can use 1 "Mage Guild" monster in your Deck as Link Material. You can only use this effect of "Protector of the Mage Guild" once per turn.
pendulum_text: You cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck except Spellcasters. You can Special Summon 1 "Mage Guild" monster from your face-up Extra Deck, but its effects are negated. You can only use this effect of "Protector of the Mage Guild" once per turn.
